Why does @Microsoft inform me that Windows 7 requires critical updates, and then not let me download them until I upgrade to Windows 10?

30 minutes on hold waiting for @Microsoft technical support. The representative is unable to help but wants lots of my personal information.
On hold with @Microsoft for 20 minutes so far, trying to find out how to install Windows 7 updates without installing Windows 10.
